objects.specification: A flat horizontal rectangular surface spanning ten by eight meters, finished in dark grey with a slightly textured non-slip coating suitable for vehicle display and visitor circulation.
A vertical rectangular wall panel of three meters height and minimal thickness, finished in a smooth neutral grey matte paint with a subtle uniform texture, creating a clean backdrop for the booth.

A vertical rectangular wall panel of three meters height and minimal thickness, finished in a smooth neutral grey matte paint with a subtle uniform texture, creating a clean side enclosure for the booth.

A vertical rectangular wall panel of three meters height and minimal thickness, finished in a smooth neutral grey matte paint with a subtle uniform texture, creating a clean side enclosure for the booth.

A vertical rectangular wall panel of three meters height and minimal thickness, finished in a smooth neutral grey matte paint, featuring a central entrance gap approximately two meters wide and two and a half meters high to serve as the main visitor entry point.
A low rectangular platform raised 0.3 meters above the floor, with slightly beveled edges and a dark grey metallic finish, designed to highlight the demo car with clean contemporary styling.
A realistic sedan car model approximately 4.5 meters long, 2 meters wide, and 1.5 meters tall, with a glossy black paint finish, detailed wheels and headlights, and authentic styling details.
An illuminated vertical display panel measuring one by two meters, with a frameless design, a luminous white background and a bright red accent border, suitable for showcasing feature information.

A modern sleek reception desk two meters wide, one meter tall and half a meter deep, finished in smooth black with a minimalist rectangular form suitable for staff interaction.
A rectangular hanging fabric banner with bright blue accent color and centrally printed car branding visuals, featuring subtle drape folds and thin aluminum bars at top and bottom for suspension.

An overhead lighting fixture with a clean industrial track-light design, white housing, providing focused bright illumination over the display area.
